title: Cardinality
description: Express constraints on the cardinality of container objects which are the values of multiply-valued attributes, including uniqueness and ordering, providing the means to state that a container acts like a logical list, set or bag.

is_ordered.description: True if the members of the container attribute to which this cardinality refers are ordered.

is_unique.description: True if the members of the container attribute to which this cardinality refers are unique.
